author: Gary
title: Gondola on the Grand Canal in Venice, Italy
text:
Gondola on the Grand Canal in Venice, Italy 
Camera NIKON D300S Aperture f/5 Exposure Time 1/2500 
Iâ€™ve been to Venice three times, and I could go back 30 more. Despite the crush of tourists in the city, especially during the high season, Venice is still one of my favorite places. 
You can see parts of Venetian culture in many places beyond Venice, however. All the way down the Adriatic coast, almost to Dubrovnik, you can find towns which were part of Venice and which still display the Venetian lion on their town walls. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
